Title: Alice
Actors: Caterina Scorsone, Andrew Lee Potts, Matt Frewer, Kathy Bates
Plot: Everything you know about Alice's Adventures in Wonderland is about to be turned upside down in this modern-day mini-series. The cast includes Kathy Bates, Caterina Scorsone, Matt Frewer, Harry Dean Stanton, and Tim Curry.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 8 wins & 14 nominations.
